body_html:
Nice!

I wonder if we should use more Python-like syntax in the pretty printing. For example: Sequential(...) vs Sequential{...} and eps=1e-05 vs eps: 1e-05.

One of the nice things about __repr__in a lot of Python objects is that you an copy-paste it into an interpreter to reconstruct the object. It might only require a few small changes to get that behavior

body:
Nice!

I wonder if we should use more Python-like syntax in the pretty printing. For example: `Sequential(...)` vs `Sequential{...}` and `eps=1e-05` vs `eps: 1e-05`.

One of the nice things about `__repr__`in a lot of Python objects is that you an copy-paste it into an interpreter to reconstruct the object. It might only require a few small changes to get that behavior
